name: Dice Roller (Wompfbeere)
description:
Made for the GMTK GameJam 2022.
Theme: Roll the dice

A tiny and simple game made by one person for the jam.

Drag the dices to form a line with the same number. ESC to return to menu.

Normal dice rules where used, so opposing sides added equal 7. 

I hope you like it! :)

Bugs:

Dices freeze on fields where dices have been on the previous level, only reloading the page helps :/

Some Problems withUI layers, but nothig big

Made by Wompfbeere
